subject: Chemistry
question_text: MnO 4 - + H + + H 2 C 2 O 4 ⇌Mn 2 + + H 2 O + CO 2 The standard reduction potentials are given as below E red ° E 0 MnO 4 - / Mn 2 + = + 1 . 51   V ; E 0 2 / H 2 C 2 O 4 = - 0 . 49   V If the equilibrium constant of the above reaction is given as K eq = 10 x , then the value of x = _______ (nearest integer)
